trans-unit.source: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coluna de células que contenham as ligações presentes num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewLinkColumn é um tipo especializado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizada para alojar logicamente células que responder a utilizador clica em.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewLinkColumn é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>classe, mas proporciona uma experiência de utilizador diferente que pode ser mais adequada em determinadas situações, tais como apresentar um URL armazenado numa tabela da base de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: To display the same link text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired link text.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar o texto da ligação mesmo para cada célula, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>propriedade `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A>propriedade para o texto da ligação pretendido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewLinkColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um DataGridViewLinkColumn tem um associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>intersetar que o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido para este tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user link clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para responder a utilizador clica em de ligação, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>eventos para responder a clica em qualquer parte na célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando a inicializar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>define este construtor de instância, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor utilizada para apresentar uma ligação activa nas células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor utilizada para apresentar uma ligação que está a ser seleccionada.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o utilizador do Internet Explorer definição para a cor das ligações no Estado Paire.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>classe inicializa esta propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> criado recentemente</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface de utilizador (IU) das células da coluna existente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Estas alterações são aparente apenas depois da coluna é novamente gerada (por exemplo, ao ordenar a coluna ou através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todos os outras células na coluna estão modeladas após.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade para um valor que não é do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of link cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para duplicar uma coluna de células de ligação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o comportamento das ligações nas células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> value indicating the link behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref> valor que indica o comportamento de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an unselected link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor utilizada para apresentar uma ligação não seleccionada nas células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to initially display a link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor utilizada para apresentar inicialmente uma ligação.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the link color.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o utilizador do Internet Explorer a definição a cor da hiperligação.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto da ligação apresentado nas células da coluna se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>

trans-unit.source: The text is visible if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O texto é visível se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property of each cell.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o texto da ligação de cada célula é preenchido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>a propriedade de cada célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the Text property value for individual cells by setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `false` after setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir o valor de propriedade de texto de células individuais ao definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>propriedade `false` depois de definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the link text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o texto da ligação.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a ligação muda de cor quando é visitada.

trans-unit.source: When TrackVisitedState is true, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property value is used to display links that have already been visited.
trans-unit.target: Quando TrackVisitedState for VERDADEIRO, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>valor da propriedade é utilizado para apresentar as ligações que já tenham sido visitadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ligação muda de cor quando estiver selecionada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>valor da propriedade é apresentado como o texto da ligação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <> </> *> valor da propriedade é apresentado como o texto da ligação; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula <> </> *> valor da propriedade é apresentado como o texto da ligação.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor utilizada para apresentar uma ligação que tenha sido visitada anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> property is set to false, the VisitedLinkColor property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>propriedade está definida como false, a propriedade VisitedLinkColor será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor utilizada para apresentar uma ligação que é visitada.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o utilizador do Internet Explorer a definição a cor da hiperligação visitados.
